extendedInfo.description: NOTE:For 2.2 and above working fine.Not work with android 2.1 (Force close)Prototype AppAre you planing to visit Sri Lanka in this Cricket World Cup 2011 Season? or are you planing to visit Sri Lanka for a holiday? Then here is a small app which will guide you to visit beautiful places in Sri Lanka with their locations.Tourism is one of the main industries in Sri Lanka. Major tourist attractions are focused around the island's famous beaches located in the southern and eastern parts of the country, ancient heritage sites located in the interior of the country and lush green resorts located in the mountainous regions of the country. A large majority of tourists come from the United States, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, Germany, France, Maldives, Japan, The People's Republic of China, and India.Whether you are a Sinhala (Sinhalese) or Tamil, English or Burger, Sri Lankan or non Sri Lankan, Buddhist, Catholic, Muslims or Hindu this app will help you.More locations will be added later..Enjoy!!

reviews.title: works well
reviews.comment: No froce close on cm7.2 u8160
